{"ok": true, "lean_translation": "import Mathlib
open MulAction Subgroup
open Pointwise

/-- Prove that if |G|=1365 then G is not simple. -/
theorem not_simple_of_card_eq_1365 (G : Type*) [Group G] [Fintype G]
    (hG_card : Fintype.card G = 1365) : ¬ SimpleGroup G := sorry"}

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- Exercise 4.5.20 (Dummit & Foote).
If |G| = 1365 then G is not simple. We only state the lemma; the proof is omitted.
-/
theorem exercise_4_5_20 {G : Type*} [Group G] [Fintype G] (h_card : Fintype.card G = 1365) : ¬ IsSimpleGroup G := by sorry
